subject: Problem extending JUnit TestCase class
msgSnippet: All my tests share many functions, so I created on base class extending TestCase; then all my actual test classes each extend this base class. I can run a
messageBody:
All my tests share many functions, so I created on base class
extending TestCase; then all my actual test classes each extend this
base class.

I can run a single test method in each of these test classes no
problem. But when I try to run all the methods in a test class, JUnit
complains that the *base* class has no test methods -- which of couse
it doesn't.

I'm doing in this in IntelliJ with a Text runner.

Any ideas from anyone?

TMIA,

r:b:
